messages.msgSnippet: Thankyou Bea, that was really great :D I think you re refering to The Flow of Life , by Anne Ohman, in Issue 4 of Connections:
messages.messageBody:
Thankyou Bea, that was really great :D



I think you're refering to "The Flow of Life", by Anne Ohman, in Issue 4 of Connections:

http://connections.organiclearning.org/Issue4/anne.html

Bea

messages.subject: go with the flow
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone have a link to an article or post pertaining to going with the flow of our lives with children. It compared consensual type living with flowing
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone have a link to an article or post pertaining to going with the
flow of our lives with children. It compared consensual type living with
flowing down a stream instead of trying to paddle against the current. It
would really come in handy right now for someone.



kathy
